Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
I always belive Indonesia is an empire, it acts like an empire it work like an empire, it base like an empire. So, what is future of Indonesia ?

I personally belive, Indonesia is destined to be an empire. Alas, Imperial Jubilee or crisis ?
Political leadership parroting about Indonesia great jubilee in 2045. Does it really so ? are we heading to new crisis ? 98 model ? how it will look like ? 

Or maybe crisis is the Jubilee ?

Content:
Today Eid Al-Fitr is not the same as 2023 or 2024, The data on people who travelling back to visit their family in hometown or their own villages are decreasing.

Content: just few months after Prabowo's Inaguration, ball of problems keep happening, all in the different levels. Stock market has just experience it's fall, constant protest in many major cities including in regions. Indeed crisis

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Just imagine, different elites keep saying statement that sometimes make us wonder. What is exactly happening ?

Author: .ayab
Content: My guy at least wait until we're 250 year old as a nation

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: In order to understand a centrallised system, we should look at the dynamics between courtiers and barons.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Courtiers, according to Oxford

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
in our languange, Abdi Dalem. 

What are these people do ? 

Of course they manage central power and giving order by the name of the king. But it could be also company and corporate structure.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
And what is Baron ? 

Baron is nobility caste, they own and control the resources. They could be your governors, CEOs, Generals. They borrowod their power from central but could not laveraged their power fully because they are controlled by the courtiers.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: In this Empire, at least both after new order fall and before the rise of Mulyono, Regional barons has great autonomy, they are free on how to deal with their respective regions.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
But after the rise of Mulyono, the way how barons are acting is changing. It goes back to the norm of New Order goverment. Now Barons are once again become the apointies of the court in Jakarta. 

They reduce barons' power by re-introducing centralisation 

https://news.detik.com/kolom/d-4934093/omnibus-law-dan-sentralisasi-kekuasaan

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
effectives, a lot of key regional position was hold by the appointies from the court. It effectively eleminated the power of regions. 

https://www.kompas.id/baca/polhuk/2023/09/05/pengamat-ada-pertarungan-politik-nasional-dalam-penempatan-penjabat

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
Mulyono successfuly laveraging this for his own political goal in 2024 election. Barons, in this case PJ kepala daerah, become the tool for courtiers to keep their power. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R-0teKfHbtg

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Election is finish, we got new president. But what does that mean ?

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
What else He need ?

The art of War is successful, At least He already put his own son as a vice president. The coalition is big. Practically there are no opposition. What could go wrong ?

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
The problem is that this is creating power dynamism. 

First, Prabowo's court getting bigger. Not only He need to cater his own court but also you got different court that has very different political goal compare to Prabowo's. 

The court getting huge and expensive to maintain. To cater new courtiers, they just created new ministries and adding more vice ministers.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Second, Indonesia is huge and corrupt. There is no way you could maintain your official court to be this big when you don't have enough money and you have such populistic program.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Wait, I just remember we have two different courts.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Let's take a quote from a book called Gulistan by Saadi Shirazi

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: In his book, The Gulistan chapter 1 of the costums of kings

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
What we can take from this ? 

First there are two courts that exist, 

Prabowo's and Mulyono's through his oldest son fufufafa

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
What does it implies ? It means that sooner or later the two will diverged from each others. There is no way this two powerful person will go along togather. It should be happen sooner or later. 

In fact I would be very surprised if they don't go against each others

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: Also, There are no realistic way Prabowo could maintain such diverse number of ministries. He can't just fire them on masses, too hard, it would be obvious. So the only way He could do that by purging them

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: How you would do that ? Of course by political accusations, corruption charge and incompetence.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content:
So, how we should see current crisis ? 

1. It is the Elite who are fighting
2. We are the collateral damage of the different political elites' star wars

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: 3. Sabotages will be common. One Elites will try to grab as much resources they can before cashing out. This happen at the expenses of the masses.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: 4. Elites dynamism should be considered when we look at the current jubilee or crisis that we are facing now.

Author: ataman_erkin
Content: ~ THE END  ~

Content: Well, this is why a managed transition to semi-federal system is necessary as a hedge for systemic crisis.

Author: mahakardus
Content: realistically, this is a path worth to pursue. At the very least, back to an Dutch East Indies style government that acknowledge particularities of regional government

Author: mahakardus

Author: chewiezzz

Author: mahakardus

Author: chewiezzz
Content: if we don't based our reformasi from Pancasila, then our nation will have an identity crisis lol

Author: mahakardus
Content:
Our identity is always in crisis since the beginning lol.

This what i cannot comprehend, why so many still attach to the concept of indonesia, despite decades of failures.

The world is changing. We already have a country like Singapore that is running based on realism and pragmatism, rather than whatever messianism that the republikens believes in. If that didnt knock someone on the head, then its their fault.

The only reason that i can think of why people refuse to see any other alternatives outside of the current concept of Indonesia is because the social sciences here is dominated by, at least, the Enlightenment, at most, Marxism.

And the republiken founders, were a believer of the dialectics(?). So perhaps many sees Indonesia as this unstopable embodiment of it and it will be an existensial crisis to go against it.

Because, if it mere about finding the right technique to run things, there is no need for people to be so dogmatic about a failing system. 

You have federalism, culture-based reforms, and what any other ideas that were around prior the republic, but none are willing to look at these, because in the end, they didnt want to go outside the current concept of Indonesia

Author: chewiezzz
Content: i think the problem lies in the volatility of changing focus in governing indonesia as a country every 4 years, hence the identity crisis

Author: chewiezzz
Content: Pancasila can be summarized in one tagline, "Unity in Diversity", and we should focus on how to govern this country effectively according to that one single focus

Author: chewiezzz
Content: so imo, we just need to do a better job in governing under semi-federalism government structure rn

Author: chewiezzz
Content: no need for radical reformation

Author: chewiezzz
Content: here I laid out my framework on how to enhance Indo semi-federalism gov model by adding futarchy gov model on top of Pancasila

Author: mahakardus
Content: From what i understand, you need an a population that able to keep up with the market. A people that have a business-culture can probably run it, but if your population generally tends to prefer thuggery in every chance they have, how can it run?

Author: chewiezzz
Content: the market will function as a "source of truth" to tell the people what is actually good for them, and bad actors (thugs in this case) will self-correct their own behavior because they need money to survive

Author: chewiezzz
Content: so futarchy is basically "a natural order where the fittest will thrive under market-efficient situation"
